entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon except mainly cloudy over eastern sections early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries over northern sections overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm except 10 cm over northern sections. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
